meanings.sent1: The socialistic policies aimed to create a fairer society for everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her socialistic beliefs led her to support policies that benefit the community as a whole.
meanings.sent3: The socialistic approach to sharing toys at the daycare made sure every child had a turn.
meanings.sent4: The socialistic nature of the community garden allowed everyone to enjoy the harvest.
meanings.sent5: The socialistic principles promoted equality and cooperation among all members.

meanings.definition: Characterized by social ownership and democratic control of the means of production.
meanings.sent1: The company's socialistic structure ensured that all employees had a say in decision-making.
meanings.sent2: The socialistic factory operated based on the principle of collective ownership.
meanings.sent3: The socialistic bakery let customers vote on the new pastry flavors each month.
meanings.sent4: The socialistic farm shared profits equally among all workers, fostering a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: The socialistic business model prioritized the well-being of workers over individual profits.
